docs.lead_paragraph: SOMEWHERE, in the far and most hospitable reaches of the White House, where Dolly Madison held court, where Lincoln slept, where Wilson danced his jigs and Truman played the piano, there will soon repose a copy (hard-cover) of "The Common Sense Book of Baby and Child Care."

headline.main: Now 'Dr. Spock' Goes to the White House; Spock' Goes to the White House

docs.abstract: article on Dr Spock notes fabulous success of his Common Sense Book of Baby and Child Care
